trans-unit.source: Represents the models workflows using the familiar flowchart paradigm.
trans-unit.target: 表示使用熟悉流程圖開發架構的模型工作流程。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> activity allows free-form creation of a workflow using nodes and links.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> 活動允許使用節點與連結建立任意格式的工作流程。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> 活動。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[錯誤處理流程圖活動使用 TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> 活動。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[錯誤處理流程圖活動使用 TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> objects contained by the flowchart.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定流程圖內含 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> objects..
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> 物件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates creating a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> 活動。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[錯誤處理流程圖活動使用 TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" /> to be executed when the flowchart starts.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定當流程圖啟動時要執行的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode" />。

trans-unit.source: The starting node.
trans-unit.target: 開始節點。

trans-unit.source: There must only be one <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart.StartNode%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 必須只有一個 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart.StartNode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates configuring the StartNode of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何設定 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> 活動的 StartNode。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[錯誤處理流程圖活動使用 TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md)範例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unconnected nodes are validated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否驗證未連接的節點。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if unconnected nodes are validated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果會驗證未連接的節點，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of <see cref="T:System.WorkflowModel.Variable" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart" />, which are available to share state across the child activities contained within the Flowchart.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定與 <see cref="T:System.WorkflowModel.Variable" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart" /> 物件集合，可在流程圖所包含的各子活動之間共用狀態。

trans-unit.source: The collection of variables.
trans-unit.target: 變數的集合。

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates using Variables in a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> activity.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例將示範如何在 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> 活動中使用 Variables。

trans-unit.source: This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md) sample.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例取自[錯誤處理流程圖活動使用 TryCatch](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/fault-handling-in-a-flowchart-activity-using-trycatch.md)範例。
